context_bundle.summary: ROI Calculation: Benefits = Time Savings + Error Reduction + Scalability + Insight Value. Costs = Dev + Maintenance + Licensing + Training. ROI = (Benefits-Costs)/Costs*100. Payback = Initial/Monthly Benefit. Typical: 2-3 month payback, 200-500% ROI Year 1.

onboarding.quick_start: Time Value = Hrs/week * 52 * (Salary+Benefits+Overhead)/2080. Error Value = Errors/yr * Cost/error. Scalability = Headcount avoided * loaded cost. Quick calc: 10 hrs/week @ $55/hr = $28,751/yr
common_patterns: Error cost = Direct fix + Customer impact + Opportunity + Reputation
Scalability: 25% growth without automation = 2 new hires. With = 0
NPV 3yr @ 10%: Sum of discounted annual benefits minus initial
known_errors: Forgetting loaded cost (salary is ~65% of true cost)
